attributes.action: change back to Challenge 21, rather than Think 25 and 30 schemes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alot of people I talk to are NOT happy about the new rules regarding the Think 25 schemes that were implemented around the country in most bars and supermarkets on June 1st 2009. We didn't feel that it was necessary to raise the age limit and whist I agree that age restriction should be stated in most places regarding the selling of age restricted products, to I.D someone who is clearly over the age of 21 is ludicrous and I for one do not agree with and many of my friends and associates don't either.
